name: dynamic-mcp-server
description: A flexible and extensible framework for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with dynamic tool registration

scripts.dev: tsc --noEmit && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.example:echo: tsc --noEmit && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' examples/echo-server/index.ts
scripts.example:base: tsc --noEmit && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' examples/base-server/index.ts
